name: Deep in the Dungeon
description:
You are stuck in a dungeon you try find your way out but the more you think you are getting close to the exit the deeper the dungeon gets.

Notes:

  • Use WASD to move around and mouse to look around.
  • The maze is randomly generated so is the placement of the maze exit it is guaranteed for the exist to be reachable, when you reach the exist you will spawn in a new map making the game endless.
  • I couldn't finish this game so there's no sound music nor effect and enemies can't hit you.

deep-in-the-dungeon-hotfix1.0:

  • fix: invert vertical mouse.
  • fix: enemies can now hit.
